thread.section_title: Archer Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Clean
thread.title_full: Very Clean - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: shellcodd
title: Very Clean
text: Hotel room was described as spacious. Did not look very spacious but it was fine for what we needed. Bathroom was spacious. Bed was comfortable. Prices of Drinks at Rooftop bar were way overpriced even for New York especially since i don't think they included the alcohol. ;) Same opinion for the dessert we decided to get at the steak house. 2 desserts for $30 is a little much. Overall the hotel was decent. Fairly close to time square. Temp in the room was a little funny. Seemed to always be too cold. Even when we turned up the temp on thermostat.
